statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, purchase_history FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3 AND name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 5, 10) AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE purchase_history->>'total_purchases' > '100' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, birthdate FROM customers WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100);
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, birthdate DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchased_item, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'VIP Customers' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchased_item, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'Email Subscription' ORDER BY preference_id
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT purchased_item, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, purchased_item FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Male' AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM customer_preferences
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100.00;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_customer_segment, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget < 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM CustomerSegments WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND budget < 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
